attributes.action: Call for an end to Human rights violations in Indian Occupied Jammu and Kashmir
attributes.additional_details:
United Nations on human rights in Kashmir
Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
 Human Rights Watch, Publications Department, 485 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY  10017 USA.
Physicians for Human Rights, 100 Boylston Street, Suite 702, Boston, MA  02116 USA 
The Human Rights Crisis in Kashmir: A Pattern of Impunity. Asia Watch Committee (U.S.), Human Rights Watch (Organization), Physicians for Human Rights (U.S.). Human Rights Watch, 1993. 1993 ISBN 9781564321046. .
attributes.background: India’s ruling Hindu nationalist party, the BJP, on August 5 scrapped a constitutional provision, article 370, which allowed the state of Jammu and Kashmir to make its own laws, putting the state under the worst lockdown witnessed in decades sending 800,000 soldiers and paramilitary forces.
